body.name: Club Car Pre 2000 "STAPLE ON" Golf Cart Seat Cover With Matching Rear Facing Seat Cover (2 Stripe)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Up To Par Covers Store

features: MADE IN U.S.A - All our products are proudly made in U.S.A and are made with high quality marine grade vinyl and top stitched for extra strength and to help prevent water from getting through. All our products are made to order. We politely ask for up to 5 business days to produce and ship.
Free samples of our colors are available by request. Just let us know what colors you would like to see. The colors on your screen may differ from what you actually receive.

This seat cover is designed specifically for the model cart listed in the title and in the pictures of this listing. They are designed to fit the original unaltered seating. If your cart does not match the title or pictures, it will not fit your seating. If you do not see your cart here, we have plenty of other options in our store. Click on our logo to see more options. You may also contact us and send pictures of your cart to help verify what you may need.

DIY - Easy to Install - This is a full replacement seat cover. They are designed to be stapled on. There will be enough material to wrap under the seat and staple. Mostly all pictures you see of our products are all customer done and a lot of our customers have zero to very little experience in upholstery work.
When your cart is complete. Please help us by reviewing the product. Send us pictures of your work. We love to see our products on your cart.
body.description: What is included in this product - Staple On cover for front seat (Seat Portion). - Staple On Cover for front seat (Backrest Portion). - Staple On cover for rear seat (Seat Portion) - Satple On cover for rear seat (Backrest Portion) - Instructions will be included.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #44,642 in Handmade Products (See Top 100 in Handmade Products) #19 in Handmade Golf Cart Seats & Covers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product. Excellent Quality and Workmenship
reviews.reviewText: Liked everything about these covers. From ordering, color selection, custom fitting, packagaing, instructions, labeling and delivery. Really a nice set of replacement covers for our 97 Club Car. Absolutely love how they fit and improved the appearance of our ole cart. Great product. Measure correctly. Takes some effort to install but well worth it. If your looking at replacing your worn out skins, this is the way to go. Very fairly priced for the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for!!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect fit. Really up dated old "ZIPPY" Great colors. Heavy duty vinyl and very well made. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Everything about these are perfect. Look, feel, colors. They arrived nicely packaged & well marked. Material is thick and very soft. I must admit I thought it was a super simple install and just jumped right in. I did not get them stretched well so I have a few wrinkles. Even so I absolutely love these and will definitely recommend and use in the future.Update 2023:Even though (due to negligence) the golf cart was let outside this past winter uncovered; these seats still look brand new!!! I would definitely recommend buying to everyone!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my new seats!
reviews.reviewText: Great quality! They arrived on time. I requested swatches of the two colors a couple months before placing my order and that took several weeks to receive and I only live a couple hours from where they are made. My neighbor has also ordered from them and she is happy with her seats as well. I definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so thankful to have found this vendor on Amazon. The seat covers are beautiful and a perfect fit. The turnaround on the order was great and the price seems very reasonable for the quality. Hope I didn’t butcher the installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit well and looks good
reviews.reviewText: They fit well and look good our our cart. Purchased front and rear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: absolutely love these, they fit good and went on easily. i would buy these again! made a huge difference in the appearance of my cart. which made my wife pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great U.S. Company to work with!
reviews.reviewText: Love the product. Very heavy-duty, durable and easy to install. Also nice to know these were made in the U.S.A. The company worked with us every step of the way during the ordering process to be sure we had the correct size and shipping was fast. Would recommend this company and their products and would order again.
